name: Adirondack Rock: A Rock Climber's Guide 2nd Edition
categories: Adirondack Rock-A Rock Climber's Guide 2nd Ed
description: Go climbing in the Adirondacks. The guide covers over 3,000 routes on 320 cliffs (78 of them new since the first publication. It includes 2 volumes contained in a slipcase. Volume 1 is 560 pages. Volume 2 is 544 pages. Each contains full route descriptions and colour images. Includes a new index sorted by route grade, new region maps, and new crag planners.
